summary: The Protect Our Heroes Act of 2025 aims to enhance the protection of federal, state, and local public safety officers. It amends Title 18 of the United States Code to criminalize the killing or assault of these officers, including law enforcement, firefighters, and judicial officers, while they are on duty or due to past performance of duties. The bill outlines specific penalties, including mandatory minimum sentences, and directs the U.S. Sentencing Commission to create or amend sentencing guidelines to include enhancements for certain offenses.
